24-223.Certification request; fees and costs.

Fees and costs shall be the same as in civil appeals docketed with the Supreme Court.

SourceLaws 1982, LB 724, ยง 5.

Cross ReferencesDocket fees, see sections 33-103, 33-103.01, 33-107.01, and 33-107.03.
